2017/KER/49298
IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM
PRESENT:
THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA
WEDNESDAY, THE 6TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/15TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939
Cr1.MC.No. 7241 of 2017 ()
SC 791/2017 OF *(ADDITIONAL SESSIONS COURT-I, NORTH PARAVUR)
(CORRECTED) .
CRIME NO.206/2016 OF ALUVA WEST POLICE STATION (ALANGAD),
ERNAKULAM.

*THE NAME OF THE LWER COURT OCCURRING INCRL.M.C. IS CORRECTED AND
SUBSTITUTED AS “ADDITIONAL SESSIONS COURT-II”, NORTH PARAVUR AS
PER ORDER DATED 13.11.2017 IN CRL.M.A.12343/2017.

PETITIONERS/ACCUSED 1 TO 3:

1. R.VASUDEVAN POTTI, AGED 66 YEARS,
S/O.RAMARAJAN POTTI, R.B.BHAVAN,
UDAYATHUM VATHIL BHAGOM, PANANGAD (P.O),
KUMBALAM VILLAGE, KANAYANNUR TALUK,
ERNAKULAM DISTRICT.

2. PRADEEP KUMAR, AGED 54 YEARS,
S/O.A.K.NARAYANAN NAIR, PAKKATH HOUSE,
NEAR PUTHENCHANTHA MOSQUE, VELLOR VILLAGE,
VAIKOM TALUK, KOTTAYAM DISTRICT.

3. SHINOOB, AGED 33 YEARS, S/O.KUTTIALI,
OLAKARA HOUSE, NEAR KARAKULAM SIVA TEMPLE,
NELLIMATTOM KARA, KUTTAMANAGALAM VILLAGE,
KOTHAMANGALAM TALUK, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT.

BY ADV. SRI.NIREESH MATHEW
RESPONDENT /COMPLAINANT-STATE:
STATE OF KERALA,
REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,
HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM,
KOCHI - 682 O31.
BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.ALEX M.THOMBRA
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION
ON 06-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE
FOLLOWING:
mbr/

2017/KER/49298
B. KEMAL PASHA, J.
~—CrLM.C.No.7241 of 2017 _
Dated this the 6" day of December, 2017
ORDER
Learned counsel for the petitioners seeks permission to
withdraw this Crl.M.C., with liberty to file another application
at appropriate stage. Permission is granted, and accordingly,
this Crl.M.C. is dismissed as withdrawn, with liberty to file
another application at appropriate stage.
Sd/-
B, KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE.
-e // True Copy // P.A. to Judge
